00018    /*
00019    * Constructor.
00020    */
00021    MemoryOArchive::MemoryOArchive()
00022     : buffer_(0),
00023       begin_(0),
00024       cursor_(0),
00025       endAllocated_(0),
00026       capacity_(0),
00027       version_(0),
00028       isLocked_(false),
00029       ownsData_(false)
00030    {}
00031 
00032    /*
00033    * Destructor.
00034    */
00035    MemoryOArchive::~MemoryOArchive()
00036    {  if (buffer_ && ownsData_) delete buffer_; }
00037 
00038    /*
00039    * Allocate a block of memory.
00040    */
00041    void MemoryOArchive::allocate(size_t capacity)
00042    {
00043       if (begin_) {
00044          UTIL_THROW("Re-allocation is prohibited");
00045       }
00046       buffer_ = new Byte[capacity + sizeof(size_t)];
00047       begin_  = buffer_ + sizeof(size_t);
00048       cursor_ = begin();
00049       endAllocated_ = begin_ + capacity; 
00050       capacity_ = capacity;
00051       ownsData_ = true; 
00052       isLocked_ = false;
00053    }
00054 
00055    /*
00056    * Return cursor to beginning.
00057    */
00058    void MemoryOArchive::clear()
00059    {
00060       if (!isAllocated()) {
00061          UTIL_THROW("Archive is not allocated");
00062       }  
00063       cursor_ = begin(); 
00064    }
00065 
00066    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00067    /*
00068    * Send a block.
00069    */
00070    void MemoryOArchive::send(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int dest)
00071    {
00072       int  comm_size = comm.Get_size();
00073       int  myRank = comm.Get_rank();
00074 
00075       // Preconditions
00076       if (dest > comm_size - 1 || dest < 0) {
00077          UTIL_THROW("Destination rank out of bounds");
00078       }
00079       if (dest == myRank) {
00080          UTIL_THROW("Source and desination identical");
00081       }
00082 
00083       size_t  sendBytes = cursor_ - buffer_;
00084       size_t* sizePtr = (size_t*)buffer_;
00085       *sizePtr = sendBytes;
00086       comm.Send(buffer_, sendBytes, MPI::UNSIGNED_CHAR, dest, 5);
00087 
00088    }
00089 
00090    /*
00091    * Send a block (nonblocking)
00092    */
00093    void MemoryOArchive::iSend(MPI::Intracomm& comm, MPI::Request& req, int dest)
00094    {
00095       int  comm_size = comm.Get_size();
00096       int  myRank = comm.Get_rank();
00097 
00098       // Preconditions
00099       if (dest > comm_size - 1 || dest < 0) {
00100          UTIL_THROW("Destination rank out of bounds");
00101       }
00102       if (dest == myRank) {
00103          UTIL_THROW("Source and desination identical");
00104       }
00105 
00106       size_t  sendBytes = cursor_ - buffer_;
00107       size_t* sizePtr = (size_t*)buffer_;
00108       *sizePtr = sendBytes;
00109       req = comm.Isend(buffer_, sendBytes, MPI::UNSIGNED_CHAR, dest, 5);
00110    }
00111  
00112    #endif
00113 
00114 }
